org.ardenus.resource

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.resource.Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ReusableStream<java.io.InputStream>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LanguageResource

    public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReusableStream<java.io.InputStream>
    Used for loading and managing data related to the Java classpath or system files using the SummerLine module path system.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      Represents the state of a InputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • toResourcePath

        public static java.lang.String[] toResourcePath(java.lang.String... path)
        Converts an array of modules to a module along with retrieving the extension.
        Parameters:
        path - the module path.
        Returns:
        The formatted module path being the first value in the array and the extension being the second value in the array.

      • getJavaURL

        public static java.net.URL getJavaURL(java.lang.String... path)
        Gets the resource URL based on the Java classpath.
        Parameters:
        path - the module path.
        Returns:
        the resource URL.

      • getFileURL

        public static java.net.URL getFileURL(java.io.File base,
                                      java.lang.String... path)
        Gets the resource URL based on the machine's file system and specified root to use. It is also allowed to leave the module path and simply get the URL of the specified root file or directory.
        Parameters:
        base - the base directory (or file if you are not specifying a module path).
        path - the module path.
        Returns:
        the resource URL.

      • getFileURL

        public static java.net.URL getFileURL(java.lang.String... path)
        Gets the resource URL based on the machine's file system and with the base being the directory that the JAR file is located in.
        Parameters:
        path - the module path.
        Returns:
        the resource URL.

        Returns:

      • getUUID

        public final java.util.UUID getUUID()
        Returns:
        the UUID of the resource.

      • getDataId

        public java.lang.String getDataId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the data currently loaded. This must be overridden by resource classes whose data can update, as the data ID represents the currently loaded data.

      • setInputStream

        protected final void setInputStream(java.io.InputStream in)
        Sets the input stream. This should only be called by classes that extend Resource that have had their data updated (and thus a new input stream).
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream.

      • canUpdate

        public boolean canUpdate()
        Returns:
        true if the data of the resource can change.

      • isReusable

        public final boolean isReusable()
        Returns:
        true if the resource's input stream is a ReusableInputStream, false otherwise.

      • openStream

        public final java.io.InputStream openStream()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ReusableStream
        Closes the currently opened stream and creates a new stream starting at the beginning of the source. To get the current stream, use the currentStream() method.
        Specified by:
        openStream in interface ReusableStream<java.io.InputStream>
        Returns:
        the newly opened stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
